statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.HelpName , AA.HelpType , M1.Name as HelpTypeName
FROM dbo.AAHelp AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.HelpType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'HelpType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.HelpName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%'
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.HelpName , AA.HelpType , AA.Content , AA.ContentByRte FROM dbo.AAHelp AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.AAHelp ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, HelpName, HelpType, Content, ContentByRte ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #HelpName#, #HelpType#, #Content#, #ContentByRte# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.AAHelp SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, HelpName = #HelpName# , HelpType = #HelpType# , Content = #Content# , ContentByRte= #ContentByRte# WHERE ID = #ID#
